name: Bacon-Garlic Green Beans
author: markfernandez
summary: Another family favorite vegetable side-dish that is simple and quick to make. Great for family dinners, Thanksgiving, or any occasion. You can substitute lime zest for the lemon zest, if desired.
directions: Place green beans in a pot and cover with water; bring to a boil
Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer until beans start to soften, about 10 minutes
Drain water, leaving beans in the pot
Place bacon strips on a microwave-safe plate and cook in the microwave until crisp, about 2 minutes
Stir butter and bacon into beans in the pot and return to medium heat; cook and stir until butter melts, 2 to 3 minutes
Add garlic; cook and stir until fragrant, 3 to 4 minutes
Top with lemon zest and stir
